trait.name: Mental Burst
entries: When the goblin dies, its pent-up mental energy explodes in a psychic blast. Each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Intelligence saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) psychic damage.

trait.name: Mental Fortitude
entries: The goblin has advantage on saving throws against effects that would make it have the {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} condition.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The goblin makes two Unarmed Strike attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage.
